summary: REQ-11 appears implemented by updating the header src to the new logo path while keeping the visible app name text and alt text as "PacePower". REQ-10 is not evidenced in the diff because no new static asset file was added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new PacePower logo image and include it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, so there is no evidence that a new image file (e.g., pacepower-logo.dim_512x512.png) was created under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx (references /assets/generated/pacepower-logo.dim_512x512.png but does not add the asset)
